job_description:
Job Description:

Torch is currently seeking a senior level researcher/analyst to support investigations of the application of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies for constructing decision aids to enhance operational performance of a new generation of short range air defense systems. The candidate will be responsible for investigating a broad range of AI technologies to include supervised & unsupervised machine learning, deep learning, and general intelligence reasoning systems. The candidate will work as part of a small research team investigating design patterns for AI systems integration and will recommend conceptual designs and prototyping strategies for demonstrating the viability of AI based decision aids. The candidate will also explore man-machine interaction concepts for using the decision aids in the context of a weapon system's conduct of fire.



The candidate must meet the following requirements:


A Doctorate degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related technical discipline plus 10 or more years directly related experience.
Experience developing machine learning algorithms using GPU accelerated computing.
Experience programming with Python, C++, MatLab, R, CUDA, and Tensorflow.
Experience developing and evaluating machine learning algorithms built using training data collected from Monte Carlo simulation runs.
Experience writing technical reports and conducting technical presentations.
Experience developing and integrating prototype systems.
This position requires the selected candidate have an active Secret-level clearance.

An ideal candidate will meet the following preferred requirements:




First hand experience with military training methods.
First hand experience operating and maintaining tactical weapon systems.
Experience conducting validation & verification of M&S technologies.
Experience managing small teams.
Experience in developing research proposals and conceptual designs.
Familiarity with high fidelity 6DOF missile models.
Familiarity with agent based models.
